preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM instance_settings WHERE ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where study_guid = 'cmi-lms' and instance_name ='cmi-lms')

column.name: mr_cover_pdf
column.value: [{"value":"notes_cb","name":"All clinic notes from treating providers, including medical oncologists, residents, fellows, radiation oncologists, surgeons, nurse practitioners, etc.","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"treatment_cb","name":"Cancer treatment data (including radiation, chemotherapy and hormonal therapy).","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"pathology_cb","name":"Pathology reports","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"operative_cb","name":"Operative reports","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"referrals_cb","name":"Referrals","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"exchange_cb","name":"MD to MD exchange","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"genetic_cb","name":"Genetic testing reports","type":"checkbox"},{"value":"dicom_cb","name":"DICOM format images","type":"checkbox"}]

update.where: ddp_instance_id in (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where study_guid = 'cmi-lms' and instance_name ='cmi-lms')

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM instance_settings WHERE ddp_instance_id = (select ddp_instance_id from ddp_instance where study_guid = 'cmi-osteo' and instance_name = 'osteo2')
